column3: Traffic;Preah Sihanouk: At 7:30 in the morning of August 28
column5: there was a collision between a PTT fuel tanker truck and another truck at Mao Pich Nil  between km 103-104. Fuel was spilled over the road.------Authorities are calling on drivers to bypass Road 4
column7: due to traffic tailbacks.------The crash came shortly after another incident at KM 108-108 which left 5 people injured. KBN
